actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Currency
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking and Currency.

official_title: A bill to impose an embargo on the export of petrochemicals until price controls on petrochemicals are removed.

summary.text: Authorizes and directs the Secretary of Commerce to prohibit the exportation of petrochemicals from the United States until such time as all price controls imposed under the Economic Stabilization Act of 1970 with respect to petrochemicals are removed.

titles.title: A bill to impose an embargo on the export of petrochemicals until price controls on petrochemicals are removed.
